EmailTemplate.name: APJ_Event_Pivotal Breakfast_Melbourne_Q119.Invite 4
EmailTemplate.subject: Pivotal Breakfast Invite: Hear Toyota's Transformation Journey
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
We are excited to announce that Charles Dagher, Manager Digital Systems, Toyota Australia will be sharing Toyotaâ€™s Transformation Journey at the upcoming Pivotal event: Driving Innovation with Application Transformation
Join us for breakfast with Lawrence Crowther, CTO APJ, Pivotal on the 2nd April in the Tea Room, adjacent to the Melbourne Supper Club, as we discuss how organisations can transform legacy applications and business processes in order to accelerate their transformation journey - dramatically improving time, cost and operational efficiencies.
Register Today: https://connect.pivotal.io/Melbourne-Breakfast-April19.html
Registration opens at 8:00am, with the formalities commencing from 8:30am and wrap up at 10:15am.
We look forward to seeing you there.
Regards,
Lionel Lim Vice President and Managing Director, Asia Pacific & Japan Pivotal
